item.title: ::commands
item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3
item.description:
@antcolony3 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("commandname")) { addItem(, ); sendMessage("equip all these and pwn them sonz of bitchz."); }
thats for items and messages to the players…for xp…here’s like atk99

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command name") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(***, *); }
thats for levels. *** = amount of xp

  • = which level.

for teleporting

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commandname")) { heightLevel = 0; teleportToX = 0; teleportToY = 0; } just change the coordinates…
that should help =D
player rights changes the rights u need for a command
